LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value: Accarda-KaR is currently only offered for Switzerland and Liechtenstein. The shop currency must be denominated in Swiss francs.

LocaleResource.Name: MessageStrings
LocaleResource.Value: Function;Authorization ID;Guardean order ID;Person ID;Credit ID;Is purchase on account ok;Is payment by instalments ok;Decision;Total amount;Interest rate;Billing date;Details about the rates;Interest;Errors

LocaleResource.Name: PaymentMethodNotActive
LocaleResource.Value: The selected payment method is not available.

LocaleResource.Name: MissingPaymentInfo
LocaleResource.Value: No payment data found. Please pass through the checkout again.

LocaleResource.Name: PreauthorizationFailed
LocaleResource.Value: We have checked your data, but based on this check we unfortunately cannot offer you the chosen payment method. Please correct your data or select a different payment method.

LocaleResource.Name: PreauthorizationError
LocaleResource.Value: Unfortunately we cannot offer you the chosen payment method. Please try it again later or select a different payment method.

LocaleResource.Name: NoOrderTotal
LocaleResource.Value: The total amount of the order cannot be calculated.

LocaleResource.Name: HoldOnCheckingData
LocaleResource.Value: We check your data. One moment please...

LocaleResource.Name: UseSandbox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check the box to use the test system.

LocaleResource.Name: ApiUrlTest.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines the API URL of the test system.

LocaleResource.Name: ApiUrlProduction.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines the API URL of the production system.

LocaleResource.Name: WebshopId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Your webshop ID. Obtained from Accarda.

LocaleResource.Name: ApiUsername.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Your API username. Obtained from Accarda.

LocaleResource.Name: ApiPassword.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Your API password. Obtained from Accarda.

LocaleResource.Name: AdditionalFee.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter additional fee to charge your customers.

LocaleResource.Name: AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: TransactionType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines when the payout should occur.

LocaleResource.Name: AddOrderNotes.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines that order notes should be created in context of the data exchange with the payment provider.

LocaleResource.Name: DefaultQuantityUnit.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines the quantity unit to be used for products.

LocaleResource.Name: TransmitItemDetails.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Sets whether to transmit product details (like product name and price).

LocaleResource.Name: TransmitItemDetailsDiscount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Sets whether to transmit the discount of the order as a product detail. Accarda recommends this option to be activated.

LocaleResource.Name: EnablePhysicalInvoice.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether the option to receive a printed invoice should be displayed in the checkout.

LocaleResource.Name: PhysicalInvoiceFee.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Sets the fee for a printed invoice.

LocaleResource.Name: PhysicalInvoiceFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines that a printed invoice fee is to be calculated as a percentage to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: EnableBusinessCustomer.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Sets whether to enable providing the data required for credit assessment of business customers during checkout.

LocaleResource.Name: CreditForKarFees.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to credit Accarda fees at refunds.

LocaleResource.Name: InvoiceAddDays.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Sets the invoice date by adding the number of days entered here to the order date.

LocaleResource.Name: DateOfBirth.Validate
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter your complete birth date.

LocaleResource.Name: PhysicalInvoice.Info
LocaleResource.Value: You will be charged a fee of {0} for a printed invoice.
